name: Demo: Compilation of Corpora
description: This implementation demonstrates the pipeline for the compilation of corpora to study the Information Structure-Prosody interface from an empirical perspective. The pipeline needs as input a txt file with the text annotated with Information Structure as explained in [3]. Then the txt format is converted to TextGrid, for the extraction and annotation of prosodic parameters. The resulting TextGrid can be transformed to a comma separated value (csv) file for statistical analysis or machine learning experiments.
